articles.author: Drew Franklin
articles.title: The KSR Pregame Show is live from Indianapolis before UK vs. Tennessee - KSR
articles.description: KSR is at Tin Roof Indianapolis for a preview of Kentucky vs. Tennessee before the Sweet 16.
articles.content: Kentucky will soon tip off in its first Sweet 16 game under Mark Pope, playing the rival Tennessee Vols in Indianapolis. The high-stakes tournament game is scheduled for 7:39 p.m. ET at Lucas Oil Sta… [+714 chars]
